course_title: Pediatric Primary Care NP Practicum III
course_description: This course continues to elaborate on primary care of children that are well, acutely ill, or have chronic conditions.  Emphasis is on the delivery, analysis, and evaluation of health care in a primary care setting.
prerequisites: NRSG 759D and NRSG 762D as prerequisites, NRSG 821D as co-requisite, or equivalent transfer credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 2540, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: L. Modly, Status: Open
